attributes.action: Take international students out of the government's immigration targets.
attributes.additional_details:
Public against cutting back on overseas students, poll finds
https://www.timeshighereducation.com/news/public-against-cutting-back-on-overseas-students-poll-finds/2015363.article
attributes.background:
International students make a valuable contribution to the country in terms of the economy, bringing in valuable skills, and cultural links with countries around the world. 
Polls show the public do not share the government's view that international students should count in immigration targets.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166911
